troubleshooting.title: Troubleshoot the building of this website

condition.title: Condition
condition.p: Building this website using these instructions is not working and it is infuriating.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: The author of the instructions hoped that nobody tried to follow the instructions since they are not very good.
The author intended for this to happen to create a dialog.

step.cmd: Contact the author of the instructions. See .
Ask if the author can write new, better instructions.

step.stepresult: Celebrate upon receipt of new instructions.
